targets.expr: sum(rate(istio_requests_total{request_protocol="grpc", grpc_response_status!="0", namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_name!=""}[1m])) by (grpc_response_status, request_protocol, app_kubernetes_io_name)

sum by (container, pod, namespace) (increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace=~"$namespace", container!=""}[5m])) / sum by (container, pod, namespace) (increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]))
